title: Trump Free Thursday, Google Wants To Watch You 3.1.18
itunes:title: Trump Free Thursday, Google Wants To Watch You 3.1.18
description:
In episode 95, Miles & guest host Laci Mosley are joined by comedian Matt Kirshen to discuss Hope Hicks resignation from the White House, Jay Z's billions, the divide on Black History Month, new AI tech that could be terrifying in the future, & more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
